There: a place/what to use if the other two don't work. Ex: look over there!
Their: someone's belongings. Ex: Give their things back Johnny I don't wanna deal with your shit.
They're: they are. Ex: They're out by the tower.
Your: something that belongs to you. Ex: yo pass me your phone.
You're: you are. Ex: you're so good at eating hotdogs!

Manual cars for people who like driving: more immersive and fun way to drive.
Manual cars for people who want to get from point A to B: more work, more annoying.

There: a place/what to use if the other two don't work. Ex: look over there!
Their: someone's belongings. Ex: Give their things back Johnny I don't wanna deal with your shit.
They're: they are. Ex: They're out by the tower.

Yup. I couldn't run for my life a few months back. Hit me like a ton of bricks. I've been running regularly and it feels great! At first I kept thinking I'm not making any progress, then I realized that a distance I couldn't run became cake. Changed my life.

Try to get your time down as much as possible with the current meothod, then explore other algorithms. I did this because when I got my time down to 1 min and 15 secs I understood how the cube operates. Learn F2L when your time is really down.

Try to get your time down as much as possible with the current meothod, then explore other algorithms. I did this because when I got my time down to 1 min and 15 secs I understood how the cube operates. Learn F2L when your time is really down.
Wow great job! I'm so glad that I've actually inspired someone to learn it! I found a few sneaky loopholes in solving the cube, so if you need anything, pm me yea?
21 degrees is the temperature that our bodies are used to. When the surrounding air is 21 degrees, then you won't feel especially cold, but you won't feel hot.

WRITING.TITLE: [LPT] never set your ac under 21 degrees Celsius, it'll last longer.
WRITING.TEXT: My AC guy told me that if you set it below that, then the compressor will be constantly on, which is a very bad thing if you want it to last longer. If it's at 21+, then it won't need the compressor. I don't have central heating/cooling, so it might only apply to single units.

WRITING.TITLE: [15/M] Guy from Bahrain wants to talk to literally anyone.
WRITING.TEXT: Heyo I'm Saeed, and I wanna talk to you. I don't care what about, as long as it's intresting. Some of my hobbies/intrests are:- History Art(can't make it for the life of me but I love seeing art lol) Playing cards Rubik's cubes Books Politics
I'm here for you. If you ever need to rant or vent to me, don't hesitate.
